title: How to Make Black Bean Veggie Burgers

steps.headline: Have your method of cooking ready.
steps.description: You can bake or grill them.

steps.headline: Mash the black beans with a fork using a medium bowl until they are thick and pasty.
Chop up bell pepper, onion, and garlic finely in a food processor.
steps.description: Add these to the black bean mixture.

steps.headline: Mix the egg, chili powder, cumin and chili sauce together in another small bowl.
Add the egg mixture to the mashed beans.
Add in bread crumbs until the mixture is fairly sticky and holds together.
Divide the mixture into four patties.
Cook the patties.
steps.description: Grilling: Place the patties on the aluminum foil and cook for about 8 minutes on each side. Baking: Place the patties onto a baking sheet and bake for about 10 minutes on each side.

text: Have your method of cooking ready. You can bake or grill them. Mash the black beans with a fork using a medium bowl until they are thick and pasty.  Chop up bell pepper, onion, and garlic finely in a food processor. Add these to the black bean mixture. Mix the egg, chili powder, cumin and chili sauce together in another small bowl.  Add the egg mixture to the mashed beans.  Add in bread crumbs until the mixture is fairly sticky and holds together.  Divide the mixture into four patties.  Cook the patties. Grilling: Place the patties on the aluminum foil and cook for about 8 minutes on each side. Baking: Place the patties onto a baking sheet and bake for about 10 minutes on each side. Finished.
